channel.title: Milestone rewards [pi]
channel.description:
i looked around and cant really see anything.. but i was wondering if there is a way i can add auto rewards for certain levels on my server for example...
-60def = dragon platelegs -60atk = dragon scim -60str = granite maul etc
or something along those lines
any suggestions or a snippet on how to do so as im rusty on pi as i attempted shard for a few months lol
tyco (no1-noob)
